what's your name.content: Hello there, my name is QT and it's wonderful to meet you! In case you're wondering, my gender pronoun is <prosody rate="slow">it</prosody>. I am really looking forward to interacting with you! I can share stories, tell funny jokes, hope to help you with your magnifier, and will ask you questions. I would like to ask you to please touch the black buttons on the tablet screen to let me know your responses as we interact. Next, I would like to get to know more about you. What's your name?

how are you.content: It's nice to meet you {'db': 'user_name', 'default value': ''}. *question_1* How are you doing right now?

talk another time.content: That's OK {'db': 'user_name', 'default value': ''} but let's plan to talk another time today or tomorrow. When is good for you?

how many hours.content: Please enter the number of hours from now<break time="0.5s"/> as <prosody rate="slow">(1-9)</prosody>.

can't wait to talk.content: *happy**QT/happy*<emphasis level="strong">{'var': 'Great'}</emphasis>, I can't <prosody pitch="high">wait</prosody> to talk to you again <prosody pitch="high" rate="slow">then</prosody>.

content: <emphasis level="strong"><prosody pitch="low">Tell me</prosody></emphasis>*question_2*, did you use your magnifier today?
transitions: how do you feel about vision

how was magnifier experience.content: {'db': 'user_name', 'default value': ''}, *question_2*how did it go with your magnifier?

liven things up.content: Let's*QT/emotions/hoora* <prosody volume="loud" rate="slow" pitch="high">liven</prosody> things up for a moment with a joke!

show me.content: Next, can you show me how you read something with your magnifier*question_1*?

tap screen.content: Tap my screen when you're done using your magnifier.
transitions: how do you feel about vision

how do you feel about vision.content: <prosody pitch="high" rate="slow">Oh</prosody>, I hope you'll find an opportunity to use it later today or tomorrow for sure. <break time="0.75s"/>*question_1*<prosody rate="slow">How</prosody> do you feel about your vision <prosody pitch="high">today</prosody>?

ask to share news story.content: <emphasis level="strong"><prosody pitch="high">Next</prosody></emphasis>, let's take our minds off reading. I would like to share a <emphasis level="strong">story</emphasis> with you. How does <prosody pitch="high" rate="slow">that sound</prosody>?

read me something.content: {'var': 'read me something'} Tap 'Next' when you're done!
